original_text: And they shall come against you from the north with chariots and wagons and a host of peoples. They shall set themselves against you on every side with buckler, shield, and helmet; and I will commit the judgment to them, and they shall judge you according to their judgments.
korean_text: 그들이 무기와 병거와 수레와 크고 작은 방패를 이끌고 투구 쓴 군대를 거느리고 치러 와서 너를 에워싸리라 내가 재판을 그들에게 맡긴즉 그들이 그들의 법대로 너를 재판하리라

sentences.original_text: And they shall come against you from the north
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 북쪽에서 너를 치러 올 것이다

sentences.original_text: They shall set themselves against you on every side

sentences.korean_translation: 작은 방패, 큰 방패, 그리고 투구를 가지고

sentences.original_text: and I will commit the judgment to them
